blocks.name: topmtcl
blocks.content: The meet of a collection of topologies on ` X ` is again a topology on ` X ` . (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 5-Oct-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 12-Sep-2015.)

  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wceq(c0, cuni(cv(s0)))), wcel(c3, c2), wral(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), cpw(c0))))
